headline.main: Unpopular Dunga Urges Fans to Get Behind Brazil
headline.print_headline: Unpopular Dunga Urges Fans to Get Behind Brazil

docs.snippet: Brazil have never lost a match in Salvador's Fonte Nova stadium but the home fans must be patient when they take on Peru in Tuesday's World Cup qualifiers, Brazilian coach Dunga said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil have never lost a match in Salvador's Fonte Nova stadium but the home fans must be patient when they take on Peru in Tuesday's World Cup qualifiers, Brazilian coach Dunga said.

headline.main: Prosecutors Consider Felony Drug Charge Against Lamar Odom
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Consider Felony Drug Charge Against Lamar Odom

docs.snippet: Prosecutors are considering a felony drug charge against Lamar Odom after the former NBA star was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors are considering a felony drug charge against Lamar Odom after the former NBA star was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel.

headline.main: Suspect Charged After 6 People Are Killed at Texas Campsite
headline.print_headline: Sheriff: 6 Killed at Texas Campsite; Man Charged With Murder

docs.snippet: William Hudson, 33, was charged with one count of murder and held on $2.5 million bond after the bodies were found this weekend southeast of Dallas, the authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: William Hudson, 33, was charged with one count of murder and held on $2.5 million bond after the bodies were found this weekend southeast of Dallas, the authorities said.

headline.main: Crews End Search of Sunken Ship Without Finding Black Box
headline.print_headline: Crews End Search of Sunken Ship Without Finding Black Box

docs.snippet: Federal investigators said Monday that they are ending their search for the voyage data recorder of a cargo ship that sank in the Atlantic during a hurricane, but remained hopeful that they could determine what happened to the ship without it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal investigators said Monday that they are ending their search for the voyage data recorder of a cargo ship that sank in the Atlantic during a hurricane, but remained hopeful that they could determine what happened to the ship without it.

headline.main: Portrait of a Paris suicide bomber
headline.sub: Portrait of a Paris suicide bomber

docs.snippet: A better understanding of the man who authorities say blew himself up in Paris is starting to emerge. Gavino Garay reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A better understanding of the man who authorities say blew himself up in Paris is starting to emerge. Gavino Garay reports.

headline.main: U.S. Firefighter Gets World's Most Extensive Face Transplant
headline.print_headline: U.S. Firefighter Gets World's Most Extensive Face Transplant

docs.snippet: A volunteer firefighter from Mississippi whose face was burned off during a home fire rescue received the world's most extensive face transplant, New York University Langone Medical Center said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A volunteer firefighter from Mississippi whose face was burned off during a home fire rescue received the world's most extensive face transplant, New York University Langone Medical Center said on Monday.

headline.main: Paris attacks likely to bruise tourism
headline.sub: Paris attacks likely to bruise tourism

docs.snippet: The attacks in Paris on Friday stand to bruise the tourism industry in one of the world's most visited countries. As Sonia Legg reports, it comes at a time of already low economic growth across Europe....
docs.lead_paragraph: The attacks in Paris on Friday stand to bruise the tourism industry in one of the world's most visited countries. As Sonia Legg reports, it comes at a time of already low economic growth across Europe.

docs.snippet: Several Republican governors said they opposed letting Syrian refugees enter their states after the terrorist attacks in Paris on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Several Republican governors said they opposed letting Syrian refugees enter their states after the terrorist attacks in Paris on Friday.

headline.main: Willie Mays, Yogi Berra Among Medal of Freedom Honorees
headline.print_headline: Willie Mays, Yogi Berra Among Medal of Freedom Honorees

docs.snippet: Baseball legends Willie Mays and the late Yogi Berra will be honored with the nation's highest civilian award, the Presidential Medal of Freedom....
docs.lead_paragraph: Baseball legends Willie Mays and the late Yogi Berra will be honored with the nation's highest civilian award, the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
